name: HEROS FIGHT Battle royal
description:
Play HEROS FIGHT Battle royal. Discover strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, then survive to become the last team in contention in fierce battles over flag captures, target destruction, and more.


Immersive experience:

LOOT, SURVIVE, SURVIVE!
Play HEROS FIGHT Battle royal
Discover strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, then survive to become the last team in contention in fierce battles on diverse battlefields.
Form a squad and rush to the enemies for the authentic original experience.
